    private void jMenuItem3ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jMenuItem3ActionPerformed

        obj.setVisible(true);
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jMenuItem3ActionPerformed
